explains: adj. 新兴的，发展初期的
v. 浮现，出现；显露，知悉；恢复过来，幸存下来（emerge 的现在分词）
wordGroup: emerging technology 新兴技术；新兴科技
emerging industry n. 新兴产业

sentences.en: Asia's emerging economies will be on a self-sustaining cycle of growth.
sentences.cn: 亚洲的新兴经济体会出现自我维持的循环增长。

sentences.en: The television screens of the next century will be linked up to an emerging world telecommunications grid.
sentences.cn: 下个世纪的电视屏幕将与一种新兴的世界电信网格相连。

sentences.en: A new order seems to be emerging.
sentences.cn: 新的秩序似乎正在显现。
